addPlayerToWaiting(String, Connection, boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GlobalLobby
Method that adds a player to the waiting list of the global lobby of the server and asks him what he wants to do next (create a new game, join a game with a specific id, join the first free spot in a random game or quit the server) if the game is not in progress or waiting to be created, otherwise it will add the player to the game lobby and the game will continue from where it is
